sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>lineage</radical> radical and the <kanji>lineage</kanji> kanji are the same.
readingMnemonic: You trace your <kanji>lineage</kanji> back and realize that every single person in your family loved <reading>ca</reading>ke (<ja>けい</ja>). Most of them were cake bakers, too!
readingInfo: You come from a lineage of cake makers and eaters. No wonder you love cake so much! (And if you hate cake, no wonder your family doesn't like you.)
